r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $144.5K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Gemalto Cogent. The average
  contract duration was 0.58 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $81.1K. The longest
  contract was 3.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $312.0K.
lookup_name: 'GEMALTO COGENT'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '144.5K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '42'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '7%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '135%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '50.8K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.58'
s421_mean_contract_value: '81.1K'
s425_max_duration: '3.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '312.0K'
---
